alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 30 at 8:52AM AKDT until October 30 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times will continue through the afternoon. A change or mix with rain is still expected near the town of Haines this afternoon, however snow will likely continue out the road near the border. Highest additional snow amounts will be near the border.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
